sentence: At a signing ceremony for the measure, Governor Ron DeSantis said that if Disney was going to use its economic might to attack the parents of my state,? he would treat it as a provocation? and fight back.? He also said that even if Disney had not commented on the Parental Rights Bill, taking away its special status would have been the right thing to do.? Representative Jim Banks (R., IN.
author: Isaac Schorr
title: Hawley Proposes Bill to Strip Disney of Copyright Protections
